SamPy.astronomy.ACSPhotometry.useSextractor¶

SamPy.astronomy.ACSPhotometry.useSextractor(input)¶

Very simple interface for running sextractor for given image. Does not return anything to the Python program. This function is superseded by the class: ‘SexTractor’ class written by Sami-Matias Niemi for the Nordic Optical Telescope.
